inn1.comm: good length on leg to start, easy clip for Guptill to get off and running. Mid-on cleans up.
141 kph, full and wide outside off. Nice pace, latham goes to drive but is beaten. Not much swing.
that's a good run, back of a length on off. Latham plays it with soft hands towards gully for a quick single
good stuff this from Chameera, fullish on off and middle. Guptill can only defend from the crease
ooh, Guptill goes for a wild hoick. Good length delivery and the shot was there to play, but the ball skids on and Guptill can only inside-edge towards his pad
good start for SL. Fullish on leg, Guptill backs away and swipes to deep square leg
slower ball to start, 106 kph. Full on off and Guptill goes after it with a good uppish drive. Lands on the bounce to mid-off
wow, trying to hit it too hard here is Guptill. Full and wide outside off, Guptill goes for a lofted upper drive but fails to connect. That was expansive
quick single and they get through. Slower yorker outside off, Guptill chops towards cover and sets off immediately. Would have been close with a direct hit
lovely lines. Full on off, Latham blocks back

lovely shot, but the ball doesn't go to the boundary. Fullish slower ball outside off, Latham clips deep into the midwicket region with an uppish flick. Pulled back just inside the boundary, they get three.
shortish length on middle and leg from around the wicket, Latham tucks to short fine leg

what a shot! Fullish outside off, Guptill clears his foot and launches a lofted drive over long-off. Superb shot, kept his shape and went over the infield. Wonderful timing helps the ball clear the boundary by a good distance.

that has disappeared into the clouds. Slower ball on off and middle, Guptill gets down on one knee and thumps a ball with a lot of elevation but there is so much bat on it, that it carries comfortably to the long-on boundary
poor from SL. Chameera has overstepped, full toss on middle and Guptill pats it towards mid-on, the fielder fumbles allowing Guptill to get back for the free hit
huge six again. Poor bowling, short on leg to this man is asking for trouble. Guptill stays in his crease, clears his front foot and wallops the pull deep over the square leg boundary. Humongous.
full and wide, Guptill belts it with a lot of power but he find cover
Latham shimmies down the track and inside-halves to midwicket. He'd be better off giving MG the strike, I presume.

gone! Latham is gone. Back of a length outside off, Latham was looking for the single with a dab to third man but can only feather one through to the keeper. SL have to keep chipping away at these wickets. Latham trudges off.
back of a length on off, KW turns this with a wristy flick to mid-on
sticks to that back of a length outside off, KW gets on his toes to punch but finds cover
gives himself room and finds the gap. That is some shot. Back of a length on off, KW backs away and finds the gap through point with a square drive. Nothing wrong with the delivery.
129 kph, fullish on off, KW skips down the track to steer to third man
looks to run it down to third man again but this time he can't find a bit of bat. Good delivery from NK. A bit of away seam movement
shortish outside off, KW flays a cut but finds point
this time he gets a gap. Fullish on middle and KW walks across to tickle it fine pats short fine leg, he'll get a couple.
did not quite hit it well enough, raced down the pitch to try and clear the mid-off fielder, KW hits to mid-off for a quick run

Out, plumb in front. Speared in the blockhole on middle, Guptill walks across to try and find the square leg boundary but misses and is struck right in front. Absolutely dead and Guptill has to walk off, writhing in pain from the yorker hitting him flush on the foot.
nicely played, pushed to mid-on for a quick single. Judged it well, safe even with a direct hit.
tossed up but drifts down leg, wide
very flat on off, extracts a bit of turn. Taylor wants to clip to leg but is taken aback by a bit of turn. Pats to the bowler
nice and flat on off. Pushed towards cover
lovely pressure. Floated up on middle, Taylor advances but nudges to midwicket who dives and stops
flat and quick outside off, crashed to the sweeper cover
slightly shortish outside off, KW goes deep and cuts late past point, earning him a couple
some flight on middle, Williamson races down to meet the ball as it pitched to drill to long-on
fullish on off, KW dabs it late to third man. Good option to produce a run
shortish outside off, Taylor too cuts down to third man to get a run

taken, KW goes now. Full delivery on middle, Williamson closes the bat-face, looking towards the midwicket region and gets a leading edge which lobs back to Chameera to take. Big wicket, KW walks back.
back of a length on off, blocked with a high elbow towards cover
overly full outside off but Nicholls opens up the face to steer to point
good end. Shortish length on off and middle, Nicholls gets high on his toes to nurdle towards mid-on for a quick single. Great over
short delivery outside off, skids onto the bat as Nicholls cuts to the sweeper cover
overpitched on leg, Taylor drives to long-on for one

what happened there? Completely slipped out of the hands. Umpire Billy calls it a no ball before changing to wide. Slips out his hands and bounces once on the pitch before bouncing two or three times in the adjacent pitch.
drives towards cover
too short, too wide. Taylor finds the gap nicely through point for an easy couple. Good batting
good length on off and middle, Taylor rocks back to punch back to the bowler
short on off, Vandersay rocks back to belt a pull to deep midwicket
flat down leg, Taylor finds fine leg. Should have been put away, missed opportunity
nicely played, goes to the boundary. Gets down early after picking his gap and executes perfectly, ramped the paddle sweep nicely to the fine leg boundary. Great batting this
that is a freebie. Short down leg, all taylor needed to do was get some bat on it and that he did. Raced to the fine leg boundary
low full toss outside off, lots of flight. Thwacked to deep cover for a couple.
the moisture not helping the legspinner. drags this short down leg. Taylor pummels the pull past short fine leg for four, not easy conditions to  bowl but these are free runs for Taylor and NZ.
